plot outline: This is the story of Durgaprasad (Soumitra Chatterjee), a old aged don who wants to be more successful and join the league of his idol, Dawood Ibrahim. His daughter Ranjita (Aparajita Ghosh Das) is in love with a struggling actor, Aparatim (Subrata Dutta). Meanwhile, Durgaprasad's outgoing call services have been barred and he sends Montu with 50,000 rupees, the outstanding amount to pay the bills. But the money gets transferred into Aparatim's account by mistake. Durgaprasad is now furious and threatens Aparatim to return the money. Does he come to know of Aparatim's real identity? Do Aparatim and Ranjita untie?
